item.title: Part-time VoIP software development contractor (san jose west)
item.description:
RHUB Communications (http://www.rhubcom.com) is a software company providing web conferencing solutions via appliances. It is a privately owned company based in Silicon Valley. It is looking for a part-time software development contractor.

Tasks:

* Develop an audio and video conferencing product
* Integrate with the line land phone system via SIP

Qualifications:

* At least two years of industrial programming experience using C++, VC++, MFC, Visual Studio, TCP/IP/UDP, and multi-threading.

* Industrial programming experience with SIP based audio conferencing projects, audio mixing and echo cancellation

* Experience with at least one popular audio codec

* BS/MS in computer science
item.dc:title: Part-time VoIP software development contractor (san jose west)
